item.title: Chat App
item.description: Simple chat app using React + Styled Components Github

item.title: Opta App
item.description: OPTA (Online Payment for Transportation) is a application for easing bus (like Damri) payment. It uses QR Scanner for the payment method. It differ from already known QR payment app, OPTA is build for bus payment, user can see the availabel bus routes. OPTA Passenger OPTA Admin (+Backend)

item.title: Mandala App Prototype
item.description: Manuskrip Dalam Aplikasi This app is about old sundanese manuscript from Ciburuy. It was built using Android Studio for the client side, Codeigniter 3 & MySQL for the backend. Features: Script visualization Search script translation Download new script from server Sundanese old script dictionary Call the Ciburuy representation App Screenshot
